Translations.Text: Sapatha ahe suryaci ani tyacya unhaci
Sapatha ahe candraci jevha tyacya mage ye'ila
Sapatha ahe divasaci jevha suryala prakata karila
Sapatha ahe ratrici jevha tyala jhakuna takila
Sapatha ahe akasaci ani tyala banavinyaci
Sapatha ahe jaminici ani tila samatala karanyaci
Sapatha ahe prana (atmya) ci ani tyala yogya banavinyaci
Maga samaja dili tyala duracaraci ani tyapasuna alipta rahanyaci
Jyane ya (atmya) la svaccha sud'dha kele, to saphala jhala
Ani jyane yala matita milavale to asaphala jhala
Samuda janasamuhane apalya vidrohamule khote tharavile
Jevha tyancyatala eka motha abhagi uthuna ubha rahila
Tyanna allahacya paigambarane pharmavile hote ki sarvasrestha allahacya sandanice ani ticya pinyacya palice (raksana kara)

Tya lokanni apalya paigambaranna khote januna tya sandanila maruna takale. Tevha tyancya palanakartyane tyancya aparadhapayi tyanna vinasata takale ani maga vinasala sarvatrika kele ani tya sampurna vastila bhu'isapata karuna takale
To ya prakopacya parinamapasuna nirbhaya ahe
Sapatha ahe ratrici jevha ti pasarate
Ani sapatha ahe divasaci jevha to prakasamana hoto
Ani sapatha ahe tyaci jyane nara va madi nirmana kele
Nihsansaya, tumace prayatna vegavegalya prakarace aheta
Tara jo (allahacya margata) deta rahila ani bhaya balagata rahila
Ani bhala'ipurna gostice satya-samarthana karita rahila
Tara amhihi tyala sahaja sulabhata pradana karu
Parantu jyane kanjusi keli ani beparva'i dakhavili
Ani satkarmacya gostinna khote tharavile
Tara amhihi tyacyasathi tangi adacanici samugri upalabdha karu
Tyaci dhana-sampatti tyala (tondaghasi) padateveli kahica upayogi padanara nahi
Nihsansaya, marga dakhavinyaci jababadari amaci ahe
Ani amacyaca hati akhirata ani hi duniya ahe
Mi tara tumhala angare(nikhare) maranarya agipasuna bhayabhita kele ahe
